creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
####<Oct 19, 2004 10:13:40 AM CEST> <Warning> <ExecuteThread: '10' for queue:
'weblogic.kernel.Default'>
<<anonymous>> <> <Web application:
ServletContext(id=1528999190,name=lenya,context-path=/lenya) tried to place a
non-serializable attribute: org.apache.lenya.ac.Identity into the session:
B0M0fKQNwq3NqpSwLfFzHZjqqCK2xD8D1m1YTv8Nnyue3tQne97t!1315478968!1098173620479.
This attribute will be lost upon redeployment. This message is logged only once
per session.> 

various lenya classes need to implement serializable to work correctly on a
cluster. an audit of the codebase to determine these classes has to be performed.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: fixed. if other classes need to be made serializable, please reopen.
